name: Ninja Granny - Angry Grandma Against Crime
name_original: Ninja Granny - Angry Grandma Against Crime
description:
***** “This grandma has packed her ninja stars and taken her fight to the streets… It’s a fun game to play with an unlikely hero protecting the streets.” - AppAdvice *****

Ninja Granny with Throwing Stars!! Ready to clean up the town!! Yikes!!!!

Neighborhood thugs don’t stand a chance. This old lady is mad and angry and will take nothing from bullies and thugs. She’s a tough grandmother with Ninja blood in her.

** Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
** Great Time-Killer Game!
** Tons of fun!

Download ‘Ninja Granny’ Now!!!
